org.ros.master.uri
Interface SwitchableMasterUriProvider.MasterUriProviderSwitcher

Enclosing class:
SwitchableMasterUriProvider
public static interface SwitchableMasterUriProvider.MasterUriProviderSwitcher

Perform a switch between MasterUriProvider instances for the SwitchableMasterUriProvider.

This class permits the use of atomic provider switches.

Method Summary
 MasterUriProvider switchProvider(MasterUriProvider oldProvider)
          Switch the provider in use.

Switch the provider in use.

Parameters:

Returns:
the new provider to use
